title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-24.3 - Valuation date; taxable status date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8186-24.3 - Valuation date; taxable status date

State Regulations

The valuation date for the 1989 market value survey is

January 1, 1989. Sample parcels appraised for the 1989 survey shall be
appraised according to their physical condition and ownership as of the taxable
status date of the base year roll designated pursuant to section
8186-24.4
of this Subpart. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8186-24.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
